title: Blue Shards
body: So I logged on and was informed that with all my runes and whatnot, I would receive 160k - ish shards, I've yet to receive them even after playing a game. I received the 60k bonus shards but never received the amount from the notification. Am I missing something here? Can someone clarify this for me?

replies.body: I tried to take a look, but that doesn't seem to be in the cards right now! Going to have you [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can take a closer look.
